ScreenSaver

Working with standard windows ScreenSaver

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original

Information

Properties
activated [get/set]

Get/Set whether the screensaver is activated

Value
flag

1 or 0 (activates/deactivates Screensaver)

Remarks

  • To toogle, simply use ScreenSaver.activated := !ScreenSaver.activated

exe [get/set]

Get/Set the screensaver executable

Value
value

screensaver executable

secured [get/set]

Get/Set whether the screensaver is secured

Value
flag

1 or 0 (activates/deactivates password protected screensaver)

Remarks

  • To toogle, simply use ScreenSaver.secured := !ScreenSaver.secured

timeout [get/set]

Get/Set whether the screensaver timeout (in sec)

Value
value

timeout of screensaver (in sec)
